title: White Belt Skill Map
description: Beginner coding skill map for Code Ninjas White Belt students.

activities.name: Your First Sprite
activities.description: Create a sprite, set its position, and make it say something.

activities.name: Fly Me to the Moon
activities.description: Move a sprite using arrow keys and prevent it from going off-screen.

activities.name: Underwater Food Chain
activities.description: Use sprite kinds and parameters to build a simple game.

activities.name: Mushroom and the Monkey
activities.description: Use life and countdown variables in a game.

activities.name: Avoid the Asteroids
activities.description: Use loops and randomness to create gameplay.

activities.name: Unlock the Hidden Treasure
activities.description: Use conditionals to decide outcomes in the game.
